title: Bug Report re-initializing weights after layer initialization
body_html:
x = Variable( torch.randn(1,10))
layer = nn.Linear(10,10,bias=False)
layer.weight.data = torch.randn(100,100)

Why is this allowed? considering the fact that it changes the entire layer

print(layer)
Linear(in_features=10, out_features=10, bias=False) 


x = torch.randn(1,10)
layer(Variable(x))

This gives a dimension mismatch error
